SubSonic + ReSharper?

Anyone have any pointers for using SubSonic in conjunction with ReSharper?  SubSonic looks superb, but ReSharper's intellisense and syntax highlighting is giving it absolutely no love.  Right now, just using a basic website project, and I've tried configuring it as a Web Application Project, but doesn't seem to like it at all.  Even upgraded to the latest ReSharper 3.0 EAP release, but no luck.

Tuesday, March 13, 2007

About

This is the personal blog of Ken Robertson. I'm a developer at Involver working in Ruby/Rails. In a former life, I worked in .NET for many years and since moved on.

In my spare time, I like to build things. I like to experiment with different technologies to find how they best fit onto my utility belt.

I sometimes blog. You'll find those things here.

I sometimes code. You'll find those on Github.
